Translations.Text: Ko ka Makko woni ko ganndal Darngal ruttetee. Dimɗe yaltataa e coomɗi mun, deyel (woo) saawataa,ngel jibintaa si wanaa e ganndal Makko.Ñalnde O noddiroyta ɓe:"Ko honto woni kafidaaɗi Am ɗin?", ɓe wi'a:"Men anndinii Ma, alah e amen seedotooɗo [ɗum]
Ɓe majjira e kon ko ɓe rewaynoo ko adii; ɓe yananee wonnde daɗirgal alanaa ɓe
Neɗɗanke on haaɓataa toragol moƴƴere. Si bone memii mo, ko o taƴotooɗo, yonndiniiɗo

Si Men meeɗinir mo moƴƴere immorde ka Amen, ɓaawo nde lorra memi mo, ko pellet o wi'ay: "Ɗum ɗoo ko min ! Mi fellitaani si Darngal daroto. Si mi ruttaama ka Joomi am, ko pellet, moƴƴere hino woodani lam ka Makko". Ma Men humpitu yedduɓe ɓen, fii ko ɓe huuwi kon, ko ma Men meeɗinoy ɓe lepte saɗtuɗe
Si Men neeminii e neɗɗanke on, o ɗuurnoo o toowna balaaje makko; si bone non heɓii mo, o wona jom toraare yaajunde
Maaku: "Yeetee lam, si wonii le ko ka Allah nde iwri, refti yedduɗon nde; haray ko hommbo ɓuri majjude on wonɗo e lurral woɗɗungal
Aray Men holla ɓe maandeeji Amen ɗin ka tatteeji e maɓɓe tigi, haa ɓanngana ɓe wonnde ko nde goonga. E yonaali wonnde Joomi maa, ko O seediiɗo kala huunde
Anndee hiɓe e sikke fii hawroygol e Joomi maɓɓe. Anndee non, ko O huɓindiiɗo kala huunde
Haa, Miim
Ain, Siin, Qaaf
Ko wano nii woni ko Allah Teɗɗuɗo, Ñeeño On wahayiniri e maa, e ɓen adinooɓe ma
Ko Kanko woodani kala ko woni ka kammuuli e ka leydi. Ko Kanko kadi woni Toowuɗo, Mawɗo On
Kammuuli ɗin no eɓɓa seekorgol dow majji, hara Malaa'ika'en no subbunhinanora yettugol Joomi maɓɓe, ɓe insinanoo wonɓe ka leydi ɓen. Anndee pellet, ko Allah woni Haforoowo, Hinnotooɗo On
Ɓen non jogitiiɓe yiɗɓe goo gaanin Makko, Allah ko reenuɗo ɓe. A wonaali reenoowo ɓe

Ko wano non Men wahayniri e maaɗa, janngeteende e aarabu, fii yo a jertin yimɓe neene ca'e ɗen e wonɓe takko mayre ɓen, jertinaa fii ñalnde dental nden, - nde sikke alaa e mu'un - Fedde goo ka Aljnna, fedde goo kadi ka Yiite
Si Allah haajuno, O waɗayno ɓe mofte goote. Kono himo On mo O muuyi ka Yurmeende Makko. Tooñooɓe ɓen non, giɗo alanaa ɓe, wanaa ballo
Kaa ɓe jogiti yiɗɓe goo gaanin Makko? Awa ko Allah woni Giɗo On, ko Kanko wuurnitata maayɓe ɓen; ko Kanko kadi woni kaɗtanɗo kala huunde
Kala ko luutondirɗon e fii mun, haray ñaawoore mun nden ko ka Allah woni. Ko On mooɗon Allah, woni Joomi am; ko e Makko mi fawii, ko ka Makko kadi mi ruttorta [tuubugol]
Fuɗɗuɗo kamuuli ɗin e leydi ndin. O waɗiranii on e pittaali mon ɗin genndooɓe, ka neemoraaɗi kadi nooneeji; Himo ɗuɗɗinira on ɗum. Hay huunde yerondiraa e Makko; ko Kanko woni Nanoowo, Yi'oowo On
Ko Kanko heerori soktirɗe kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin. Himo wertana arsike on mo O muuyani, O ɓiɗtinana (mo O muuyani). Pellet, ko O Annduɗo kala huunde

O sar'inanii on e diina kan, konko ko O yamirnoo Nuuhu, e kon ko Men wahayini e maaɗa, e kon ko Men yamirnoo Ibraahiima, e Muusaa e Iisaa, wonnde: "Ñiɓnee diina kan; hara on seertaali e makka". Kono Ko noddotaa sirkooɓe ɓen e mun kon, mawnii e dow maɓɓe. Allah non hino suɓanoo ɗum, mo O muuyani, O fewna e Makko, kala tuuboowo

Ɓe seertaano, si wanaa ɓaawo nde ganndal ngal arde e maɓɓe, sabu bewre hakkunde maɓɓe. Si wanaano fii Konngol ardinoongol, immorde ka Joomi maa, haa e lajal taƴaangal, ñaaweteno hakkunde maɓɓe. Ko pellet, roninaaaɓe Deftere nden ɓaawo maɓɓe, hino e sikke fii mayre sikkitiiɓe

Noddu (yimɓe ɓen) kisan; ñiiɓiraa no yamiraɗaa non, wata a jokku mbeleeɗe maɓɓe ɗen, maakaa: "Mi gomɗinii ko Allah jippini kon (fow) e Defte, mi yamiraama kadi, nunɗugol hakkunde mon. Allah woni Joomi amen e Joomi mon. Ko menen golle amen woodani, ko onon kadi golle mon woodani. Yeddondiral woo alaa hakkunde amen e mon. Allah mooɓoyay e denndaandal. Ko ka Makko woni ruttorde nden
Ɓen wennjirooɓe e diina Allah kan, ɓaawo ka jaɓaneede, hujja maɓɓe on ko meere, tikkere no fawii e maɓɓe, hino woodani ɓe kadi lepte saɗtuɗe
Ko Allah woni jippiniri Deftere nden goonga, e manndakke ɗen. E ko anndin maa? Hino gasa hara Darngal ngal ko ko ɓadii

Ɓeya ɓe gomɗinaali ngal ɓen, hiɓe heñoringal; gomɗimɓe ɓen kan, ko ɓe hulu fii maggal, e hoore hiɓe felliti wonnde ko ngal goonga. Awa anndee wonɓe yeddondireede ɓen fii Darngal, ko pellet, ɓe wonii e nder majjere woɗɗunde
Allah ko newaniiɗo jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen. Himo arsike on mo O muuyani. Ko Kanko woni Doolnuɗo, Fooluɗo On
Kala tawɗo ko baraaje ndun laakara o faalaa, Men ɓeydanay mo mbarjaari makko ndin; kala kadi tawɗo ko jayru ndun aduna o yiɗi, Men okkay mo ɗum, hara non o alaa ka kaalara (ton) geɓal

Kaa hara denndaaaaɗi hino woodani ɓe, sar'inanɗi ɓe e diina kan, kon ko Allah duŋaaki fii mun? Si wanaano fii Konngol [happunoongol] ngol fii senndugol [hakkunde maɓɓe], ñaaweteno hakkunde maɓɓe. Ko pellet, hino woodani tooñuɓe ɓen, lepte muusuɗe

A yi'ay tooñuɓe ɓen hino huli e ko ɓe fggitii kon, ɗum le ko yantayɗum e maɓɓe. Gomɗimɓe ɓen, ɓe golli golle moƴƴe, hiɓe e dinngire naakooji, hara hino woodani ɓe ka Joomi maɓɓe, kala ko ɓe faaletee. Ko ɗum tigiri, woni ɓural mawnungal ngal

Ko ɗum woni ko Allah wewlinirta jeyaaɓe Makko gomɗimɓe ɓen, ɓe golli golle moƴƴe. Maaku: "Mi lamndaaki on njoɓdi e ɗum, si wanaa tun giggol enɗam ɗam". Kala faggitiiɗo moƴƴere, Men ɓeydanay mo moƴƴere e hoore mayre. Pellet, Allah ko Haforoowo, mantoowo

Kaa ɓe wi'ay o fefindor nde e hoore Allah fenaande. Si Allah haajuno, O notayno e ɓernda maa nden. Alla no meha meere nden, O tabintinira goonga kan Daalol Makko ngol. Pellet, ko O Annduɗo gunndooji ɓerɗe ɗen
Ko Kanko woni jaɓanoowo jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen tuubuubuyee, O yaafoo bonɗi ɗin, e hoore Himo anndi ko golloton kon
Himo jaabinana gomɗimɓe ɓen, ɓe golli moƴƴuɗi, O ɓeydana ɓe e ɓural Makko ngal. Heeferɓe ɓen non, hino woodani ɓe lepte saɗtuɗe
Si tawno Allah yaññanno jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen [fow] arsike, pellet, ɓe bewayno ka leydi; kono Himo jippinira emmbere ko O muuyi. Pellet, ko O Hummpitiiɗo, yi*oowo jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen
Ko Kano woni jippinoowo toɓo ngon ɓaawo ɓe taƴaade, O saaka yurmeende Makko nden. Ko Kanko kadi woni Giɗo, Yettiniiɗo On
Hino jeyaa e maandeeji Makko ɗin: tagugol kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, e ruugayɗi ɗi O saaki ɗin hakkunde majji. Kanko e fii mooɓindiroygol ɓe ngol, si O haajii, ko O hattanɗo
Kala ko heɓi on e masiibo, ko sabu ko juuɗe mon ɗen faggitii kon. Himo yaafoo non, ko ɗuuɗi
On wonaali laawotooɓe ka leydi ; alanaa on gaanin Allah, giɗo, wanaa ballo
Hino jeyaa e maandeeji Makko ɗin: dogayɗe ɗen ka maayo, wa'uɗe wa pelle
Si O haajii, O deeƴinay henndu ndun, ndu waɗtinira tabitndu e hoore maggo. Wonii e ɗum, maandeeji, wonannde kala muññotooɗo, yettoowo
Maa yooliraɗe sabu ko ɓe faggitii kon. Himo yaafoo non ko ɗuuɗi
Wennjooɓe ɓen e Aayeeje Amen ɗen, hino anndi ɓe alaa laaworde
Kala ko okkaɗon e huunde, ko dakamme nguurndam aduna; ko ko woni ka Allah kon, ɓuri moƴƴude woni kadi ko heddotoo wonannde gomɗimɓe ɓen fawotooɓe e Joomi maɓɓe
woɗɗitotooɓe bakkaatuuji mawɗi ɗin e pankare ɗen, si wonii ɓe tikkii, hara ɓe yaafoto
ɓen nootiiɓe Joomi maɓɓe, ɓe ñiɓni julde nden, ɓe tawata fiyaaku maɓɓe on ko diisondiral hakkunde maɓɓe, nafqooɓe e kon ko Men arsiki ɓe
e ɓen tawɓe si bewre heɓii ɓe, ɓe yottoto
Njoɓdi bonnere, ko bone yeru mun. Kala non yaafiiɗo o moƴƴintini, haray njoɓdi makko ndin ko ka Allah woni. Pellet non, O yiɗaa tooñooɓe ɓen
Kala non yottiiɓe ɓaawo ɓe tooñeede, ko ɓen woni ɓe laawol [nanngitireede] fawaaki e mun
Ko laawol [nanngitireede] fawii e mun, ko tooñooɓe yimɓe ɓen, hara hiɓe bewira e leydi ndin ko aldaa e goonga: ɓe ɗon, hino woodani lepte muusuɗe
Muññiiɗo on kadi o yaafii, ko pellet, ɗum no jeyaa e pellital fiyakuujI
Kala mo Allah majjini, haray giɗo (goo) alanaa mo ɓaawo ɗum. A tinay tooñuɓe ɓen, tuma ɓe yi'i lepte ɗen, hiɓe wi'a: "Hara laawol ruttorde no woodi

A tinay ɓe kadi, hiɓe weeɓitee e magge, hara hiɓe yankinii koyeera on, hiɓe ndaarira ndaarɗe leppagol. Gomɗimɓe ɓen wi'aya: "Ko woni hayru ɓe ɓen, ko ɓen hayrimɓe ko'e mun e ɓeynguureeji maɓɓe ɗin Ñalnde Darngal". Anndee pellet, tooñuɓe ɓen no e lepte duumiiɗe
Yiɗɓe alanaa ɓe, ko wallitoo ɓe, hara wanaa Allah. Kala non mo Allah majjini, haray laawol alanaa mo
Nootee Joomi mon, ado ñalaande arde, nde ruttoowo alaa ɗum ka Allah. Nden ñalnde, faaborde alanaa on, yeddugol kadi alanaa on

Si ɓe ɗuurnike non, haray Men nuliraali ma, aynoowo ɓe: fawaaki ma, si wanaa yottingol. Si wonii Men meeɗiniri neɗɗanke on neema immorde e Amen, o wewlira mo; si ko bone non heɓi ɓe, sabu kon ko juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen ardiniri, a taway pellet, neɗɗo on ko jedduɗo sanne
Ko Allah woodani laamagol kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin. Himo taga ko O muuyi. Himo yeɗa mo O muuyani ɓiɗɓe rewɓe, O yeɗa kadi mo O muuyani ɓiɗɓe worɓe
maa O jillira ɓe worɓe e rewɓe; Himo waɗa dimaro, on mo O muuyani. Pellet, ko O Annduɗo, Haɗtanɗo

Sellantaa neɗɗanke, nde Allah yewtata mo, si wanaa wahayu, maa e ɓaawo heedo, maa O immina Nulaaɗo (Malaa'ikaajo), on wayahina e duŋayee(sakkitoore) Makko, kon ko O haaji. Pellet, ko O Toowuɗo, Ñeeñuɗo

Ko wano non Men wayayinir e maaɗa, ruuhu on [Alqur'aana] e yamiroore Amen. A anndaano ko woni Deftere, maa gomɗinal; si ko woni, Men waɗunde ndaygu, ngu Men fewnirta on mo Men muuyani e jeyaaɓe Amen ɓen. Pellet, ko a fewnoowo e laawol focciingol
laawol Allah, On jeyɗo ko woni kammuuli e ka leydi. Anndee, ko ka Allah, fiyakuuji ɗin ruttotoo
Haa, Miim
Mi woondirii Defere ɓanngunde nden
Men waɗii nde janngeteende [e ɗemngal] aarabu, belajo'o, on haqqilay
Pellet, hinde woni ka Amen gaa, ka yumma Defte, toowunde, ñeñaande
E Men acciray jippinangol on jantoore nden, ɗuurngal on, fii on wonii yimɓe fantimɓe
Ɗuuɗii e Annabaaɓe ɓe Men nuli e adinooɓe ɓen
Annabaajo araali e maɓɓe, si wanaa ɓe jalkitay mo
Men halki ko ɓuri ɓe saɗtude doole ! Toode mise adinooɓe ɓen yawtiino
Ko pellet, si a lamndike ɓe: "Ko hommbo tagi kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin?" Ɓe wi'ay: "Ko Fooluɗo, Annduɗo On tagi ɗi
On waɗiranɗo on leydi ndin weertaandi, O waɗani on ɗate e mayri, fii no ɗoworon
On jippinrɗo toɓo ka kammuu, yeru haaju, Men wuurnitiri ngo leydi maayndi. Ko non yaltinirteɗon
On taguɗo nooneeji ɗin fow, O waɗirani on e laaɗe ɗen e neemoraaɗi ɗin, ko waɗɗoron
fii yo on fotondir e hoore majji, refti annditon neema Joomi mon On, tuma fotondirɗon e majji, wi'on ontuma: "Senayee woodanii eltanɗo men ɗum On, men wonaano taaqanaaɓe ɗum
menen non, ko ka Joomi amen woni ko men ruttotoo
Ɓe waɗani Mo geɓal e jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen ! Pellet, on neɗɗanke ko yedduɗo ɓannguɗo
Kaa woo O jogiti ɓiɗɓe rewɓe e ko O tagi kon, O heertinani on ɓiɗɓe worɓe ɓen
Si goɗɗo e maɓɓe wewliniraama ko o waɗirani kon Hinaranke On misal, yeeso makko ngon niɓɓita metteendi hombo suuɗi
E ko on ne'eteeɗo e cuɗaari, hara kanko on ka yeddondiral, wanaa o ɓannginoowo haala
Ɓe waɗi Malaa'ikaaɓe tawɓe ɓen ko jeyaaɓe Jom Hinaranke On, rewɓe ! Kere ɓe seedino tageede ɓen? Awa fii seedagol maɓɓe ngol winndete, ɓe lamnditoyee
Ɓe wi'iti: "Si Jom Hinaranke On haajuno, men rewataano ɓe". Ɓe alanaa ɗum hay e ganndal; ɓe wonaali, si wanaa hiɓe fena
Kaa ko Deftere Men addani ɓe ado ndee ɗoo, hara ko nden woni ko ɓe jogitii
Si ko woni, ɓe wi'iu: "Menen men tawu baabiraaɓe amen ɓen e diina, haray ko e batteeji maɓɓe men feewirta
Ko wano non, Men nulaali jertinoowo aditaade ma e saare woo, si wanaa hooreeɓe maɓɓe neemiiɓe wi'ay: "Menen men tawu baabiraaɓe amen ɓen e diina, ɗum non ko batteeji maɓɓe ɗin men ñentinta
O maaki: "Hay si mi addan on ko ɓuri feewude kon ko tawruɗon baabiraaɓe mon ɓen?" Ɓe wi'i: "Menen dey, ko men yedduɓe ko nulidaɗon e mun kon
Men yottii e maɓɓe. ndaare no battande fennuɓe ɓen wa'unoo
Janto tuma Ibraahiima maakannoo ben makko e yimɓe makko ɓen: "Min on ko mi daɗndiiɗo e kon ko rewoton
si wanaa On taguɗo lam, Kanko On, O fewnay lam
O waɗi ngol konngol heddotoongol ɓaawo makko, belajo'o, ɓe ruttoto
Si ko woni, Mi dakmitii ɓee ɗoo e baabiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen, haa nde goonga kan arunoo e maɓɓe, e Nulaaɗo ɓannguɗo
Nde goonga kan arunoo e maɓɓe, ɓe wi'i: "Ɗum ko mbilewu, menen ko men yedduɓe ɗum
Ɓe wi'iti: "Ko hanno ndee Alqur'aanaare jippinee e gorko mawɗo ca'e ɗen ɗiɗi

E ko kamɓe senndata yurmeende Joomi maa nden? Awa ko Menen woni ko senndi nguureeji maɓɓe ɗin hakkunde maɓɓe, ka nguurndam aduna. Men ɓamti yoga maɓɓe e hoore ɓeya, darjaaji, fii no yoga maɓɓe jogitora yoga eeltane. Haray ko yurmeende Joomi maa nden, ɓuri moƴƴude e kon ko ɓe mooɓata
Si wanaano fii wata yimɓe ɓen wonu mofte goote, Men waɗayno e cuuɗi kala yedduɗo Hinnaranke On: kiɓɓe kaalisi e ŋabbirɗe ka ɓe ƴawra
(Men waɗayno kadi) e cuuɗi maɓɓe ɗin, dame e ndaɗɗude ka ɓe soɓɓindoo
e cuɗaari. Kono ɗum fow wonaali, si wanaa dakamme nguurndam aduna. Ko laakara on ka Joomi maa, woni fii gomɗumɓe ɓen
Kala ɗuurniiɗo e jantoore Hinaranko On, Men wuurta mo e seytanuuru, hara ko ndun woni ko o coowodata
Ɗin (awaseeji) non, ko sakkorayɗi ɓe e peewal ngal, haa ka ɓe sikkata hiɓe feewi
Haa si o aroyii e Amen, o wi'a: "Ee bone ! hara hakkunde am e maa woɗɗirayno goɗɗal fuɗɗirɗe ɗen ɗiɗi woɗɗiri ! A bonii cinndadiiɗo
[Ɗum] nafataa on hannde - nde tawnoo on tooñii - wonnde ko ka lepte hawtuɗon
E ko an naninta faaɗuɗo maa fewnaa bumɗo e on wonɗo e nder majjere ɓanngunde
Si Men aru ƴettitude ma, haray ko Men yottotooɓe e maɓɓe
maa hara Men holle ko Men kammbirani ɓen kon, haray noon ko Men gaynooɓe fii maɓɓe
Jogito kon ko wahayinaa e maaɗa. Pellet, hiɗa jokki laawol focciingol
Ndee non [Alqur'aanaare], ko nde teddungal maa an e yimɓe maa ɓen. Aray nde lamnditeɗon
Lamndii e ɓen Nulaaɓe Amen ɓe Men nulunoo ado maa, si Men waɗuno ko wanaa Hinnaranke On, reweteeɗi goo
Gomɗii Men immindinii Muusaa e Aayeeje Amen ɗen, haa e Fir'awna e mbatu mun ngun, o maaki: "Ko mi Nulaaɗo Jeyɗo tagu ngun
Nde o addannooɓe Aayeeje Amen ɗen, e jaka yoo hiɓe jalaɗi
Men hollaali ɓe Aaya, si wanaa haray on ɓuri adiiɗo mo on mawnude. Men nanngiri ɓe lepte ɗen, belajo'o, ɓe ruttoto
Ɓe wi'i: "Ko an yo mbileejo! Torano men Joomi maa, ko O ahodi kon e maaɗa. Pellet, ko men feewooɓe
Nde Men huncannooɓe lepte ɗen, e jaka yoo, hiɓe firta [ahadi]
Fir'awna noddi e yimɓe ɓen, o wi'i: "Ko onon yo yimɓe am, wanaa min jey laamu Misra? E hino ɗii canɗi no ila e ley kuɓeeji am? E on yiyataa
Kaa mi ɓuraa teddude oo hoyɗo mo eɓɓataa laɓɓinnde haala
Awa ko hanno jawle kaŋŋe werlee e makko? Maaɗum Malaa'ika'en arda e makko, na jokkondiri
O ɗaytini yimɓe makko ɓen, ɓe ɗowtii mo. Pellet, ɓen ɗon laatino yimɓe faasiqiiɓe
Nde ɓe tikkinnoo Men, Men yottii e maɓɓe; Men yooli ɓe fow
Men waɗi ɓe ardiiɓe e misal, wonannde sakkiitiiɓe ɓen
Tuma nde geɗal neene Maryama on piyiranoo misal, tawaa yoo, yimɓe maa ɓen no sooƴira ɗum
ɓe wi'i: "Ko reweteeɗi amen ɗin ɓuri moƴƴude, kaa ko kanko?" Ɓe piyiranaali ma ngal (misal), si wanaa fii wennjugol. Wurin, ko ɓe yimɓe saɗtuɓe wennje
Awa (Iisaa) wonaali, si wanaa jeyaaɗo mo Men neemini e mun, Men waɗi mo misal woannde ɓiɗɓe Israa'iila ɓen
Si Men haajuno, Men waɗtitirayno on Malaa'ika, ko lomtoo ka leydi
Pellet non, ko o anndinorde Darngal. Wata on sikkito fii maggal. Jokkee lam, ko ɗum woni laawol focciingol ngol
Wata seytaane falo on ! tawde pellet, ko o gaño mon ɓannguɗo
Nde Iisaa ardunoo e ɓannguɗi ɗin, o maaki: "Gomɗii mi ardanii on e ñeeñal, e no mi ɓannginirana on yoga e ko luutondirɗon e muuɗum. Haray hulee Allah, ɗoftoɗon mi
Pellet, ko Alla Woni Joomi am e Joomi mon. Rewee Mo. Ko ɗum woni laawol focciingol ngol
Feddeeji ɗin luutondiri hakkunde majji. Bone woodanii ɓen yedduɓe, immorde e lepte ñalaande muusuɗe
Hara ɓe habbi si wanaa nde Darngal ngal ardata ɓe e juhal, hara ɓe so'aa anndude
Welduɓe ɓen, nden ñalnde, yoga maɓɓe ko ayrooɓe yoga; si wanaa gomɗumɓe ɓen
Ko onon yo jeyaaɓe Am ! Kulol alanaa on hannde; wonaa on sunotooɓe kadi
ɓen gomɗimɓe Aayeeje Amen ɗen, ɓe woni jebbiliiɓe
naatee ka Aljanna, onon e nannduɓe e mon, hiɗon saɗnee
[Gollooɓe] hino wanngindinee e maɓɓe, mirannji kaŋŋe e ñedduɗe; hino ton kadi: kala ko wonkii muuyetee, gite dakmitoo. Hara le, ko on duumotooɓe ton
Ko on woni Aljanna mo roniniraɗon, sabu kon ko gollaynoɗon
Hino woodani on ton, muuyanteeɗi ɗuuɗuɗi, ɗi ñaamoton e mun
Pellet, bomɓe ɓen, ko ka lepte Jahannama ɓe luttoyta
ɓe hoynantaake, tee hara ko ɓe taƴiiɓe ton
Men tooñaani ɓe few, si ko woni, ko kamɓe woni tooñuɓe ɓen
Ɓe nodda: "Ko an yo Maaliku ! Yo Joomi maa gaynu fii amen !" O wi'i: "Pellet, ko on luttooɓe [ton]
Gomɗii Men addanii on goonga kan ; kono ɗuuɗuɓe e mon, ko añuɓe goonga
Kaa ɓe eɓɓu feere ? Doo ko Men fewjooɓe
Maa hara ɓe sikku Men nanataa gunndooji maɓɓe e sirru maɓɓe? Oo’owoye! Nulaaɓe Amen ɓen hino maandina takko maɓɓe
Maaku: "Si Hinaranko On no jogitii ɓiɗɗo, ko min adotonoo rewude on
Senayee woodanii Jeyɗo kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, Jeyɗo Arsi kin; laaɓuɗo e kon ko ɓe sifrotta Mo. @Corrected
Accuɓe ɓe jumpa, ɓe fija haa ɓe hawroya e ñalaande maɓɓe ndeɓe fodaa
Ko Kanko woni On reweteeɗo ka kammu e reweteeɗo ka leydi, ko Kanko kadi woni Ñeeño, Annduɗo On
Barke heewanii On Mo woodani ɗum, laamu kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin e ko woni hakkunde majji. Ko ka Makko anndal fii Darngal woni. Ko ka Makko kadi rutteteɗon
Ɗi ɓe rewata ɗin gaanin Makko jeyah tefoore, si wanaa seediiɓe goonga ɓen, hara hiɓe anndi
Ko pellet, si a lamndike ɓe, ko hommbo woni ko tagi ɓe? Ɓe wi'ay: "Ko Allah". Ko honno non ɓe yiiliraa
[Himo anndi kadi] fii ko (Nulaaɗo) on maakunoo kon: "Ko an yo Joomi, pellet, ɓee ko yimɓe ɓe gomɗintaa
Awa yaafo ɓe, maakaa: "Kisal !" Aray ndebe annda
Haa, Miim
Mi woondirii Defere ɓanngunde nden
Men jippinirii nde e jemma barkinaaɗo, Men siforii wonde jertinooɓe
Ko e on (jemma) woni ko senndetee kala fiyaaku ñeñaaɗo
Ɗum ko yamiroore immorde ka Amen. Men siforii wonde Nulooɓe
yurmeende immornde ka Joomi maa. Pellet, ko Kanko woni Nanoowo, Annduɗo On
Jeyɗo kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin e ko woni kon hakkunde majji, si wonii ko on yananaaɓe
Reweteeɗo goo alaa, si wanaa Kanko. Himo wuurna, Himo wara. Jeyɗo on Jeyi baabiraaɓe mon aramɓe ɓen
Ko woni tun, ɓe wonii e sikke, hiɓe fija
Habbito ñalnde kammu ngun ardata e curki feeñuuki
suddayki yimɓe ɓen. [Ɓe wi'anee]: "Ɗum ko lepte muusuɗe
Joomi amen, huncan men lepte ɗen. Menen ko men gomɗimɓe
Ko honno ɓe waajitorta, ko goongo Nulaaɗo ɓannginɗo ariino ɓe
Refti ɓe hucciti, ɓe wi'i: "Ko tinndinaaɗo, haangaaɗo
Awa ko Men ittooɓe lepte ɗen seeɗa; kono pellet, ko on ruttitotooɓe
Ñalnde Men nanngiroyta wippannde mawnde nden, pellet, ko Men yottoytooɓe
Gomɗii Men jarribinoke ado maɓɓe, yimɓe Fir'awna ɓen, Nulaaɗo tedduɗo ari e maɓɓe
wonnde: "Waɗee e juuɗe am, jeyaaɓe Allah ɓen. Min ko mi Nulaaɗo e mon, hoolniiɗo
E wonde wata on townitano Allah, tawde mi addanay on hujja ɓannguɗo
Min kadi non, mi moolorii Jeyɗo lam On Jeyi on, nde fiɗotonmi kaaƴe
Si on gomɗinaa lam, haray selee lam
O noddi Joomi makko, wonnde: "Ɓee ɗoo, ko yimɓe bomɓe
Yaadir e jeyaaɓe Am ɓen jemma; anndon ko on cukketeeɓe
Accaa maayo ngon deeƴa [si on lummbii] ɓeya kan, ko konu yooleteengu
Ɗuuɗii ko ɓe acci e gese e ɓulli
e remuruuji e koɗande teddunde
e neemaaji ɗi ɓe wonunoo e neeminireede
Ko wano non. Hooti Men ronini ɗi yimɓe goo
Kammu ngun toɓaali ɓe, wanaa leydi ndin, ɓe wonaali kadi muñanteeɓe
Gomɗii Men daɗndii ɓiɗɓe Israa'iila ɓen e lepte hoyneeje
immorde e Fir'awna, tawde o laatino townitiiɗo, jeyaaɗo e fantimɓe ɓen
Gomɗii Men suɓorike ɓe e dow ganndal e hoore winndere nden
Men okki ɓe maandeeji, ɗi jarrabuyee ɓannguɗo woni e mun
Ɓee kan no wi'a
Ndee wonaali, si wanaa maayde amen aranere nden tun. Men wonatah immintinoyteeɓe
Awa artiree baabiraaɓe amen ɓen, si wonii ko on goonguɓe
Kere ko kamɓe ɓuri moƴƴude kaa ko yimɓe "Tubba'in" ɓen e ɓeya adinooɓe ɓe? Men halkuno ɓen, tawde hari ko ɓe bomɓe
Men tagiraali kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin e ko woni hakkunde majji kon, fijooɓe
Men tagiraali ɗin ɗiɗi, si wanaa e goonga. Kono ko ɓuri ɗuuɗude e maɓɓe, ɓe anndaa
Pellet, ko Ñalaande Senndindiro ngon, woni ko ɓe saatinanaa, kamɓe fof
Ñalnde nde giɗo duncanoytaa giɗo [mun] hay huunde; ɓe wonaali kadi walloyteeɓe
si wanaa mo Allah yurmaa woo. Pellet, ko Kanko woni Fooluɗo, Hinnotooɗo On
Pellet, leggal Zaqquumi ngal
ko ñaametee bakkondimɓe ɓen
A sikkay ko taayinaa ; hino fata ka nder deedi
Wano wulɗam fatirta
Nanngee mo pooɗiron ka hakkunde dulɓaynge
refti yuppon ka hoore makko, lepte fatinaaɗe ɗen
Meeɗu non ! An [sikkunooɗo] ko a fooluɗo, tedduɗo
Awa ko ɗum woni kon ko sikkitiɗon e mum
Pellet, gomɗuɓe ɓen wonii e weerde hoolniinde
e nder gese e ɓulli
hiɓe ɓoornoo ko ɗaati e ko tekki, hara hiɓe fewtondiri
Ko wano non. Men resini ɓe kadi yaajuɓe gite
Hiɓe nodda toon, kala muuyanteeɗi, hara ko ɓe hooliiɓe
Ɓe meeɗataa ton maayde, si wanaa maayde aranere nden. O daɗnda ɓe lepte Jahiimi ɗen
ko dokkal non, immorde ka Joomi maa. Awa ko ɗum woni maloore mawnde nden
Ko Men newiniri nde e ɗamngal maaɗa, ko no ɓe waajitora
Habiito. Kamɓe ko ɓe habbitiiɓe
Haa, Miim
Jippagol Deftere nden, ko immorde ka Allah, Fooluɗo, Ñeeño On
Pellet, hino e tagugol kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, maandeeji wonannde gomɗimɓe ɓen
Hino e tagugol on ngol kadi, e kon ko O saaki e ruugayɗi, ko maandeeji wonannde yimɓe yananaaɓe ɓen

E luutondirgol jemma e ñalorma ngol, e kon ko Allah jippiniri ka kammu, immorde e toɓo, O wuurnitiri ngo leydi ndin ɓaawo ndi yoorude, e firlitagol keneeli ɗin, ko maandeeji wonannde yimɓe haqqilooɓe ɓen
Ɗin ko maandeeji Allah ɗi Men janngirante hoore goonga. E ko honɗum e yewtere ɓe gomɗinta, ɓaawo [yewtere] Allah nden e Aayeeje Makko ɗen
Bone woodanii kala fenoowo bakkondinɗo
Mo no nana Aayeeje Allah ɗen hino janngee e dow makko, refti o hedditora e townitaare, wa si tawii o nanaali ɗe. Awa wewlinir mo lepte muusuɗe
Si o anndii goɗɗum e Aayeeje Amen ɗen, o jogitora ɗum jalnori. Ɓen ɗon, hino woodani lepte hoynooje
Jahannama hino caggal maɓɓe. Ko ɓe faggitinoo duncanoytaaɓe hay huunde, wanaa kon ko ɓe jogitinoo yiɗɓe ko wonaa Allah. Hino woodani ɓe lepte mawɗe
Ndee [Deftere]ko peewal. Ɓen yedduɓe non Aayeeje Joomi maɓɓe ɗen, hino woodani lepte soɓuɗe muusuɗe
Ko Alla oon woni ko eeltanta mon maaya ngam laaɗe ndoga e hengo e dow yamiroore Makko, ngam ɗaɓɓon e ɓural Makko e yaama joo njetton
O eeltani on ko woni e kammuuji e ka leydi fof, wonii e ɗuum kaawisaaji wonande yimɓe miijatooɓe
Maakan ɓeen goonɗiɓe yoɓe njaafa ɓeen ɓe tijjaaki nyalɗi Alla ngam O yoɓa ɓe yimɓe koɓe paggittono ko
Kala golluɗo ko moƴƴi,ko fii hoore-makko; kala kadi bonnuɗo,yantay e makko refti ko ka Joomi maa woni ruttorde mon
Min tottii banii Israa*iil deftere e nyeenyal e annabaagal Min njeɗiɓe e dagiiɗi Min ɓurniɓe ko heewi e binnde hee
Min totti dallillaaji ɓannginooji ɓe luuraani si wonah caggal nde ganndal ari e mum en sabu bewre hakkunde maɓɓe pellet Jooma na nyaawa hakkunde maɓɓe nyande darnga koɓe njeddandiratnoo ko
Refti Min mbaɗma e laawol e yamiroore Amen, woto rew belaaɗe ɓeen ɓe nganndah
Pellet ɓeen ɓe nafataama gaa e Alla hay huunde pellet toonyooɓe yogo e mum en ko weldiiɓe, Alla woni keeda hulɓe ɓe
O quraana kombo gite e peewal e yurmeende wonande yananaaɓe
Mbela ɓeen waɗɓe boneeji na nanndi e goonɗinɓe ɓe golli golle lobbe hoɓe fota e nguurndam mum en e maayde maɓɓe bonii koɓe nyaawata
Alla tagrii kammuuji e leydi goonga ngam kala fittaandu yoɓee kondu fagginoo ko kamɓe ɓe toonyetaake

Mbela a yiyaani oon jaggirɗo belaaɗe makko deweteeɗo Alla majjini mbo e dow ganndal O uddi nanɗe makko e ɓernde makko, O waɗi e gite makko hee cuddi ko hombo feewnata oon caggal Alla mate on miiccataaka
Heeferɓe wii ɗum wonah si wonah nguurndam aduna min maaya min nguura, halkataa min si wonah jamaanu, ɓe ngalanah ɗuum ganndal ɓe cikkita tan
Si aayeeje Amen ɓannguɗe njanngaama e mum en hujja maɓɓe wonatah si wonah ngaddee baabiraaɓe amen si on ngonii goonguɓe
Maaku ko Alla wuurnata on refti O wara on refti renndina on faade ñalawma darnga mbo sikke alah e mum, kono ko ɓuri heewde e yimɓe nganndah
Woodanii Alla laamu kammuuji e leydi, ñande darnga darii ñande heen meerenteeɓe perta
Haɗa yiya -aan nulaaɗa- kala lenyol na gurfanii e koppi mum,kala lenyol na noddiree deftere mum hannde woni ko njoɓeteɗon ko ngollatnaɗon e nder aduna
Ndee ko deftere amen honde wowla goonga, Min ngoniina Min ceeraani wonde emin njamira nde winndate ko ngollatna ɗon
Tawi ko ɓeen goonɗinɓe ɓe ngolli golle lobbe O naatnatɓe e yurmeende makko, ko ɗuum woni mala ɓanngungal
Tawi ko ɓeen heefareeɓe mbela aayeeje Am ɗe njanngetanooke e dow mon mawnikiniɗo laatiɗon yimɓe bonɓe
Sibɓe wiyaama pellet fodoore Alla ko goonga sikke alah heen mbi*on min nganndah ko woni darnga, min cikkiti cikkitagol min ngonaani yananaaɓe
boneeji ɗi ɓe faggitinoo ɗin feñana ɓe, ko ɓe jalkitaynoo kon fiiltoo ɓe
ɓe wi*ana hannde Min njejjita mon hono no njejjitirɗon pottal ñalngu mon hannde ngu, ko yiite woni hoɗorde mno on ndanyatah walladiiɓe
ɗuum noon ko sabu on njaggarii aayeeje Alla ɗe jalkito nguurndam aduna hoomti on,hannde ɓe njaltatah e yiite ɓe nduttataaka aduna ɓe golla golle lobbe haa Alla weleeɓe
Woodanii Alla yettoore nder kammuuji e leydi Jom binnde
Na woodani Mbo manngu nder kammuuji e leydi ko kanko woni mbo gooto foolah ñeeñuɗo
